definition: surname Mi/name of an ancient state

sentences.english: Orders-in-Council make government regulations and appointments.
sentences.chinese: 樞密院令制定政府法規和約定。

sentences.english: North-South security guards House, responsible for North and the South two security guards of the Privy Council.
sentences.chinese: 北南護衛府，負責北南兩個樞密院的護衛工作。

sentences.english: Two unusual features of the Judicial Committee of the Privy Council should be borne in mind.
sentences.chinese: 樞密院司法委員會有兩個特別的性質需要了然於胸。

sentences.english: We do not care for privy chamber of government.
sentences.chinese: 我們不照顧樞密院室的政府。

sentences.english: The soldiers flung the chairs out of the windows of the senate - house into the square , and began making fires.
sentences.chinese: 士兵們把椅子從樞密院窗戶扔到廣場上，升起了火堆。

definition: Zhang Juzheng (1525-1582), Grand Secretary during the Ming dynasty, credited with bringing the dynasty to its apogee
members of the Hanlin Imperial Academy 翰林院, employed as imperial secretaries from the Tang onwards
place where the emperor listened to lectures (traditional)
first Sui emperor (541-604) Yang Jian (541-604), reigned 581-604
to sack/to remove from a position/to depose
